title: Big Dipper: The Interchain Explorer
description: Big Dipper is a renowned and open-sourced blockchain explorer with audience from 140+ countries. Supporting multiple languages, Big Dipper is an all-around monitoring and staking tool of over 20 blockchain networks and counting.
bd1: Our journey in blockchain space started as an ecosystem project in Cosmos. As we needed an explorer for our chain, we built our own block explorer.
bd2: After a while, we saw HackAtom3 Validator Series was coming. So we gave our explorer a name, and Big Dipper was born. In astronomy, Big Dipper is such an amazing asterism that were used by ancient people from both the east and the west as a pointer to find directions.
bd3: Our goal is to make Big Dipper as the pointer for people to explore the internet of blockchains.
bd4: Since its launch in Oct 2018, Big Dipper has been used by people from over 140 countries. We will continue to enrich the features of Big Dipper to make it an all-around monitoring/staking tool and information hub for many blockchains and hence, the Interchain.
dd1: A secure and easy way to manage your crypto assets with real time block data.
dd2: You can send, receive, choose your validators, and vote on proposals on Big Dipper Wallet.
dd3: The beauty of our wallet is that it is very straightforward to operate with sufficient hints, and we provide all the information you need in one place!
